definition.name: NXspm_piezoelectric_material
definition.doc: Description and properties of the piezoelectric actuator materials. The piezoelectric actuator is usually composed of polycrystalline solids and attached at the head of the tip or cantilever. The material deforms when the external electric field (e.g., electric force) is applied.

field.name: name
field.doc: The name of the material of the piezo scanner such as Lead Zirconate Titanates (PZTs).

field.name: identifier_piezo_material
field.doc: The identifier of the piezo material.

field.name: type
field.doc: The type of the material of the piezo scanner (e.g. piezoelectric ceramics, polymer-film piezoelectrics).

field.name: density
field.doc: The density of the piezo material.

field.name: relative_permittivity
field.doc: The relative permittivity (dielectric constant) of the piezo material.

field.name: D_piezoelectric_constant
field.doc: The D_piezoelectric_constant (with substitutable part D) piezoelectric charge coefficients of the material. The coefficients describe the electric polarization generated by the applied stress on the material. Different coefficients correspond to different relative directions of the polarization and the stress (e.g., d33, d31).

field.name: G_voltage_constant
field.doc: The constants (with substitutable part G) define the electric field produced by the external mechanical strain. Different coefficients correspond to different relative directions of the electric field and the strain (e.g., g33, g31).

field.name: K_electromechanical_constant
field.doc: The electromechanical constant measures the efficiency of the conversion of mechanical energy into electrical energy.

field.name: P_pyroelectric_constant
field.doc: The pyroelectric constant defines the change of the polarization vector of the piezoelectric material per unit change in temperature.

field.name: acoustic_impedance
field.doc: The acoustic impedance of the piezo material.

field.name: young_modulus
field.doc: The Young's modulus of the piezo material.

field.name: surface_resistivity
field.doc: The surface resistivity of the piezo material.

field.name: temperature_range
field.doc: The temperature range of the piezo material. This field is expecting a range of temperatures in an array [min temperature, max temperature].

field.name: glass_transition_temperature
field.doc: The range of temperature where a piezoelectric hard material transforms into the viscous state.
